Meet Dr. Bae

Dr. Rebecca Bae

See One, Do One, Teach One

Coming from a family of teachers, Dr. Rebecca Bae has always loved to teach and educate. She tutored students of all ages during high school, taught at an SAT prep school during college, instructed dental students while attending New York University College of Dentistry and now trains dental residents at Hackensack Meridian Health.

As an educator, Dr. Bae is also dedicated to being a forever student. She has traveled to numerous states to take over 800 hours of continuing education from the top educators in dentistry. She loves to continuously learn and stays current in most up-to-date dental technology and research.

EDUCATION

Dr. Bae graduated in 2008 from NYU College of Dentistry where she was enrolled in the accelerated 7 year BADDS program. She went on to further her education with a one year general practice residency at Hackensack University Medical Center in Hackensack, NJ.

Upon completion of her residency program, she was asked to return as an attending faculty at the hospital. She is currently an attending medical staff at Hackensack Meridian Health where she teaches and oversees dental residents.

✦ General Practice Residency (GPR)

at Hackensack University Medical Center

✦ Certificate of Completion

in Advanced and Comprehensive Program on Temporomandibular Disorders and Orofacial Pain from Dr. Jeffrey Okeson at University of Kentucky College of Dentistry

✦ Aesthetic Advantage Course

with renowned leading cosmetic dentist,Dr. Larry Rosenthal

✦ Associate Fellowship Certification

from World Clinical Laser Institute

✦ Qualified Dentist Designation from AADSM

(American Academy of Dental Sleep Medicine)

✦ Invisalign Certified
